Description: Body sherd of Attic pottery band cup; interior glazed black; exterior: reserved handle zone; dilute brown band at edge of black lower body; inscription in handle zone.
Curator's comments: See Smith 1888, 233, no. 8 i, with the emendation by Beazley and Payne 1929.

According to Heesen, the sherd comes from either a Gordion cup or a little master cup with Gordion features, which in this case is the reserved handle zone bears part of Sondros's neat signature (Heeson 2011, 33). The sherd itself comes from a smaller and finer cup than is typical of other little master cups.
